website_summaries.verdict: This top-notch freeze-dried dog food is made with fresh human-grade ingredients in a balanced formula that delivers optimal nutrition for dogs of all ages.
pros: A combination of 77% meat, organ, and bone with 23% organic produce and natural vitamins and minerals delivers excellent nutritional balance for everyday meals
Enhanced with 100% organic produce, minerals and unprocessed vitamins
Loved by picky eaters and ideal for dogs with food allergies
cons: Active dogs may require more than the feeding guidelines on the package

customer_reviews.title: Lamb has been good, chicken arrived possibly spoiled
customer_reviews.text: Usually we’re pleased with Primal lamb nuggets. We ordered chicken this time and it arrived substantially powdered rather than discrete firm nuggets (see photo). Don’t know if it was pounded in transit, is old, or got moist — but In an era when dog food is being reported as contaminated and is killing animals, it’s unusable in this condition There’s no option available for return or refund.
customer_reviews.author: roto

customer_reviews.title: This is a suggestion please, please note!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product however I order every few weeks which is a lot of money and I order from this same place. Just asking that the bags not be so squished as it’s very soft and my dog will not eat the crumpled food so I lose 1/3 to 1/2 of the quantity of the bag. Last one was very bad. Just threw most away and am ordering again. I only have a 4 lb Yorkie so this should last a bit. Look at my order history it tells the story. Ordering again but did not know how to tell the seller. Just asking whoever is handling your product is squishing and crumpling it to heck.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Expensive/my dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: While this is an incredibly expensive product, my dog is old (14) so I am trying to do all I can to keep her going. The recommendation for her weight (45 pounds) is to feed about 8 pieces a day - well that would mean that the entire bag would be gone in a couple days - at a cost of $30 a bag. I am not sure who can afford that. I supplement with other food to make this work.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Dog Loves it... Packaging Sucks!
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loved this. I will be going to my local TSC or Pet Club to try different flavors. Only 3 stars because 95% of the bag was crumbs. I know it is freeze dried and easy to crumble up, but was slightly disappointed that it only had maybe 4 nuggets still formed when I got it. Might be worth the hassle of going to the store to buy it to get it in formed cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great overall but with some quality control issues.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve tried all kinds of dog food with our little Maltese and he never wolfed down his food as quickly as this brand. After trying several different flavors he seemed to react to chicken the best. However we took off a star because this latest bag was quite different quality wise. It smelled different and the consistency was much firmer which led to our picky eater just avoiding his meals altogether. I’m guessing there are some quality control issues that still need to be addressed.
customer_reviews.author: yoojin kim

customer_reviews.title: Great product that makes feed raw to your dogs easier.
customer_reviews.text: Primal is highly recommended by many breeders now a days. The fact that it is a complete and balanced dehydrated raw diet makes it so much easier to use for those that want raw diets for their dog's but don't want the mess. The only problem I have with this product is every dog owner I recommend this to and for my own dogs as well, says that their dogs are still really hungry afterwards and go and eat another dog's food. I love primal. I think it's a great idea. I follow the guidelines on their website to calculate how much you are supposed to give. It just never seems to be enough.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dogs with rumbly tummies
customer_reviews.text: God send,, 15 year old chihuahua with serious food sensitivities that even just chicken Breast and rice didn't totally resolve. Tried this product on a whim, doubted it would work but money back guarantee helped. First try and my dog loved it. Almost 2 months later and he has only had 2 bouts of a rumbly tummy instead of every other day on anything else. It is a bit pricey but doable for small dogs. He gets 3 bricks twice a day so 6 daily so I bag last me about a week or so. That would make each meal probably close to 2 dollars but it is well with it!!
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: helps so much with dog's fear of men
customer_reviews.text: I have to constantly do behavioral adjustment training with one of my german shepherds for her fear of men and these treats are a miracle. She is extremely picky and will tire of any treat, and only freeze dried beef liver was what she would take at one point, but even that got old. I've been using these since last year and she still LOVES them and will chomp on these treats instead of barking when we walk by a spoopy male hooman.
customer_reviews.author: ivette reyes

customer_reviews.title: Usually quite excellent
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been LOVING this stuff for a while now. It's not cheap, obviously, but I feel it's worth it. Until I opened my latest bag. It was rancid. Smelled like chemicals or rancid nuts. It was very strange. This stuff usually smells good. My dog was completely turned off by it. Not sure what happened, but I don't like gambling 40 for dog food to "maybe" get freshness.
customer_reviews.author: Buck Et Head

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed with this product. I've been feeding my dog Primal because she loves it so much but this time around the chicken and the turkey and sardine formula came with a really bad smell. My guess is that the products are old and expired. The chicken which I buy all the time always had a yummy smell but not this time. My dog wouldn't eat it. Actually she pushed away her food bowl with her nose refusing it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Kim

customer_reviews.title: insanely picky maltipoo loves this food
customer_reviews.text: I fed my maltipoo Stella and Chewy's freeze-dried raw lamb or chicken patties for 7 years before he got tired of that food. I tried many other types of food, but he would hunger strike for days at a time because no other type of food interested him. Then I got this brand and added a bit of warm water and roasted organic chicken on top to add an appetizing chicken aroma, and my maltipoo gobbles it up. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Deepthy

customer_reviews.title: Great food for picky eating dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving this to my mini Yorkie and Chihuahua for the past 4 years and they love it. I mix it in with Wellness dry food. For some of us, small dogs can be picky eaters and I can truly say that my dogs love this and gobble their food up. I have no complaints and truly keeps my tiny baby's healthy and able to eat all their food. It's a bit on the pricy side but again, your pets are family so I still give them the best. Truly recommend it especially for picky eaters.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: I like this product and find it easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and find it easy to use. I gave it to my Toy Poodle and he had constipation, be sure to follow the manufacturer"s instructions on how to use.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: I mistakenly purchased this. I tried to buy the cat variant of it only to find out I accidentally purchased the dog variant. Rather than return it, I took it to my mother as she has 2 dogs. They gobbled this thing up so quick. Basically, take one of the cubes (i used multiple cubes) and add water. I used my hands to gently massage the water into the food cube until it formed a nice paste. They seem to have loved it because they completely ignored their kibble food and went straight to this. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Qin

customer_reviews.title: u want your dog to be healthy and have a full shiny coat? try this food
customer_reviews.text: yes it's expensive. but let me tell you , your dog will benefit greatly from this food. no more allergies, scratching, losing hair, etc... this food has all the nutrients the dog needs in RAW freeze dried form. Freeze drying preserves and the nutrients lost in processing, like in can and dried food. grain free (will make a HUGE difference also)
customer_reviews.author: ErnieBerley

customer_reviews.title: Super easy nutritious and the dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I was feeding my dog a high quality dry food but switched and have never looked back. My westie loves this. It's identical to the primal raw blocks. It costs a little more but it's convenient and no raw meat thawing in the fridge. You do have to rehydrate but it's pretty easy w warm water. Some of the varieties are harder to break apart but the chicken crumbles pretty easily. You need to work the water in w a fork and give it a minute or two to absorb. I contacted primal and they sent me some samples of the other varieties so we could try them before buying them. My dog loves them all.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Best food for picky dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are like little wolves when they smell me preparing this Primal food. They can’t get enough of this. My dogs are picky eaters and I’m happy I tried this. I’d highly recommend, their customer service is very responsive and helpful with any questions
customer_reviews.author: Sashagirl

customer_reviews.title: My 2 Finicky Shih Tzu's will eat this without a fuss.
customer_reviews.text: My Shih Tzu's have been eating it for years. They are 7 years old. Healthy and strong. Easy for me to transport. Easy to break up in food dish and serve. I don't add water. It does get a little messy if their beards and ears need trimmed. If you have a Shih Tzu in "full coat" you may want to reconsider.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: My dog has shown so much imporvement since adding this ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog has shown so much imporvement since adding this to his diet! His fur is much more thick, soft, and luxurious... This food also gave him the nutritional boost he needed to fully develop out of puppy-hood! I've been recommending this left and right at the dog park.
customer_reviews.author: Ana H

customer_reviews.title: Pets love it.  I don't like the form it comes in.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs appear to love the taste. I don't like the form it comes in. Sometimes it is hard to break up. Then it needs to be moistened with either water, broth or goats milk. I wouild continue to use it if it was easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schudda

customer_reviews.title: My 6 Dogs Love It! As Long As It Lasts.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 Dogs love this raw foods alternative, and it helps me avoid the drudgery of having to slice/mince raw organ meats or organic vegetables for their meals. I just wish I could get more of this product for the premium price tag it demands (i.e. a small fortune to feed 6 dogs). As you can imagine, 14 ounces doesn't go far with 6 dogs. In addition, my 6 cats prefer this food also. Maybe, one day they'll make a feline version.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Gist

customer_reviews.title: Good, but frozen version is better
customer_reviews.text: My dog has food allergies and has really benefited from being on the Primal raw diet. However, if you have somewhere to buy the frozen nuggets near you, I would suggest that instead of the freeze dried food. The freeze dried food did not last nearly as long as the frozen cubes (even though this was a bigger bag) and about 1/3 of the cubes were no longer in cube form when they arrived. I'll continue to buy Primal but just not this particular product.
customer_reviews.author: Meb

customer_reviews.title: I love this product for camping with my dog
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for camping with my dog, good value it rehydrated really well and of course my dog loves it! Only real downside is that its mainly broken up crumbs, I don't have this issue when I find it local but from Amazon it seems to get bashed up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Davis

customer_reviews.title: This brand is a little bit pricey BUT, my baby deserves the BEST!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My pup is now 5 years old. The first year she drove me crazy trying to find a food to her liking. I’d follow her around with kibble in my hand begging her to eat. One day I saw Primal in a local pet store. Macy LOVED it!!!!! She wolfed it down in 30 seconds!!!! My only drawback is that she eats CHICKEN ONLY!!!! But that’s her, not the food. The last four years it’s been easy at feeding time. Oh! And Macy is a little white Bichon. No tearing that black yuck from her eyes. No more staining!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: We had a 4 day backpacking trip and our dog is too old to carry her own food. We tried it before we left on the trip. She loved it. It is very lightweight and you don’t need a lot of water to mix it.
customer_reviews.author: susan hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: I like the smell of the chicken better than the pork ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell of the chicken better than the pork or lamb. My dog loves them all, and I like that it's a good, healthy meal for her. I also like that it's a dehydrated raw food, so it keeps a long time in the pantry and is easily and quickly hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: H. Foley

customer_reviews.title: Foul Oder coming from bag
customer_reviews.text: I normally have no problem with this seller, I buy a bag every two weeks for my 5 pound yorkie Chloe. This bag when opened smelled horrible and when I tried to feed Chloe she smelled the food and ran away! I’m so disappointed and need to get her food now from the pet store! So disappointed and now I lost $28.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Good dog food, high quality, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey, but our Yorkie and Maltese/Poodle both love this stuff. We tried many other brands of quality dog food and this is the best one we have found so far. You are supposed to add water to reconstitute it, but our dogs prefer it dry. This is a raw product, just freeze dried, so it can carry bacteria once water is added, hence the instructions to wash your hands after touching it. We have never had an issue with this food causing any problems and the dogs don't leave it in their bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Robin H.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this (but they are corgis and very food motivated).
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how great these are healthwise but I do know everyone vouches for it, and my dogs LOVE it. I only use it as a topper due to the price but everytime I prep dinner and bring this out my dogs jump for joy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Y.

customer_reviews.title: My dog thinks its candy
customer_reviews.text: Best food ever. I have a Coton de Tulear that has worn me outbring so finicky. You can’t imagine all of the cans I have taken to the shelter because she refused to eat them any longer. Boxes of dehydrated food gone in the trash bin. Now when I’m smashing the nuggets she comes run and almost takes the bowl out of my hand. I have her on a mix ofhalf kibble and half Primal twice daily. Feeding time was never more pleasant!
customer_reviews.author: GeorgiaPres

customer_reviews.title: My super picky dog loves this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is probably the pickiest eater you will ever see. He loves this stuff and quickly eats it and wants more. I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Roma Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Primal Nuggets
customer_reviews.text: I get these for my ferrets. Usually they love these. However, they won’t touch this last bag I purchased. Obviously, something is wrong with this bag and potentially others.
customer_reviews.author: Aletha

customer_reviews.title: Primal pets makes great food. My dog is not personally a fan ...
customer_reviews.text: Primal pets makes great food. My dog is not personally a fan of the freeze dried formula of most dog foods. I've tried rehydrating it, he'll eat it for a few days but then he gets bored of it. We prefer the frozen but if this is all you have available it's a solid choice for freeze dried food.
customer_reviews.author: Leona Fallas

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves these, I crumble them up add some warm water, then her kibble and she is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: RSOrton

customer_reviews.title: Made our dachshund sick :(
customer_reviews.text: Our dog normally eats Costco Kirkland puppy food but after trying this food he became beyond ill. While my mom was in town with her dog she left out this Primal Freeze Dried Nugget food for her dog, well because I own a dachshund he went over everyday and would eat a little of the food. He LOVED IT! The following day we get woken up to our dog whining, vomiting and having diarrhea. After reading other reviews like this I put two and two together. Now we're off to an emergency vet. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Mia V

customer_reviews.title: Lot of fuss for mush
customer_reviews.text: Having to wait while nugget rehydrates and the amount produced is not worth the extra expense and time. My dog wasn’t very interested when all was said and done
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Stevens

customer_reviews.title: I crumble it up so it easy for her to eat
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! Finicky Havanese loves this. I crumble it up so it easy for her to eat. She likes it better than a kibble. I feel this is a complete and nutritious food for my dog. It is expensive, but I think it is worth it to see her enjoy her food and lick the plate clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lindali

customer_reviews.title: This batch just wasn’t up to par.
customer_reviews.text: I order primal freeze fried chicken flavor food all the time and use it as a food topper for my 2 Rottweilers. I am a little disappointed as much as this food costs. That I would receive a pkg of what seems to be old and stale. Very hard to break apart. You can definitely tell the difference between fresh and stale.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too expensive
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. I crumpled up on top of hard food but too too too expensive l I had to quit buying them. They learned there was no more and had to eat plain dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: SPOILED FOOD? Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: My dog will not eat this food! As another reviewer mentioned, perhaps some bags are spoiled, but my dog will not eat this and they are not taking returns. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT - pick something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, just doesn't hold up to Amazon delivery
customer_reviews.text: I ordered from Amazon hoping to make life easier by not needing to track down at pet store. I love the quality of the food and it has worked really well for my small dog. HOWEVER, when I opened the package there were no nuggets - just fine crumbles. My puppy actual prefers this product dry and the powder like consistency just wont work. Can't return, I'll just have to find somewhere else and look at this as an expensive lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: BAK

customer_reviews.title: Picky Eater No more
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old Lhasa Apso has finally found food she will eat!! I still drop a treat here or there as a topper for her, but she LOVES this food. We’ve also tried the lamb, pork, duck, beef, and quail nuggets (same brand) and she loves them all!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Lange

customer_reviews.title: ... pet store that Primal freeze-dried dog food was the best and most healthy food for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I was told at my 'fancy' local pet store that Primal freeze-dried dog food was the best and most healthy food for my dogs. They absolutely love it too! I supplement this with their dry food - about 50/50 and they seem better than ever. Fantastic product. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made my 2 dogs violently ill. No return either
customer_reviews.text: My 2 cavaliers became violently throwing up this food both days I gave to them. It didnt break up or dissolve easily with warm water. Extremely expensive, cannot return. Waste of money and not healthy in my eyes for my dogs. I do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: charliegirl

customer_reviews.title: Our new Morkie LOVES this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Our new Morkie LOVES this stuff. She goes nuts in the AM when I give her a cube. Our vet urged caution as not many use this. Humm...
customer_reviews.author: aKent

customer_reviews.title: Superior food for dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. I normally don’t feed him processed ‘dog food’, only real food that I would consume. However, this packaged food is of superior grade.
customer_reviews.author: LaMa

customer_reviews.title: DOGS love it!
customer_reviews.text: My elder Boxer needed a little more 'pick me up'.... needless to say all my dogs love it. I feed it to them as a treat, I don't add water..
customer_reviews.author: Dawn O

customer_reviews.title: Freeze-dried raw food, great for puppies!
customer_reviews.text: When I brought my puppy home, he was already eating Primal Nuggets. Although the price seemed a little high, I didn’t realize how nutritious this food would be for my growing puppy. They are super easy to hydrate and cuts down on feeding time for me. Finnegan absolutely loves them! Highly recommended for optimal nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: E. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Licks chops
customer_reviews.text: My chihuahua Maxx as allergies (yeast an sugar) primal raw food an freeze dried food is the perfect answer Maxx enjoyes ever bite Thx
customer_reviews.author: claudette renzulli

customer_reviews.title: Good for weight management
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to food for my dogs weight maintenance. She loves it but it is expensive for a two week supply at best
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Primal dog food
customer_reviews.text: My 3 dogs all love the freeze dried raw chicken. I moisten it with warm water, add pellets and a 5 star canned dog food. They will eat this alone but it costs so much I need to stretch it out with other products. It did not upset their stomachs when 1st used nor did it cause diarrhea like lesser quality products. I highly recommend the product. It is also easier to break up and mix with water than some other brands.
customer_reviews.author: roadrunner

customer_reviews.title: Good product, probably will order again
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for my dogs... they like it a lot and I feel good supplementing their diet with raw food but wish it wasn’t so expensive for the amount you get
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This food is a life saver for my Qblue heeler with bladder issues. I use this instead of raw when we go camping and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mikolle Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Crumbs not nuggets
customer_reviews.text: I purchased beef and chicken. The chicken came in nugget form and my pups love it! The chicken came in crumbles and the few nuggets that were in there were very small and not the same size. Tried to exchange and it says your not allowed. I would love to know how much crumbs to feed them
customer_reviews.author: MERCEDES VASQUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Consistency Matters
customer_reviews.text: We feed this brand exclusively to our dog. He likes all the flavors. However, this flavor alone seems prone to becoming dust in the bag. It makes measurement difficult. Stick to the other flavors! They're all 5 stars. PRODUCT UPDATE: 3/28/19 -- Primal seems to have slightly improved the consistency so the bricks don't crumble so easily in the bag. Still not as hard as other flavors, but much improved.
customer_reviews.author: Mahatma Head

customer_reviews.title: Completely crushed
customer_reviews.text: The last bag I received was completely crushed making it difficult to measure the correct amount for each feeding.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Primal pet food. Chicken Sick dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I received a bad batch of Primal Chicken. Both of my dogs vomited. It went to smell it and it smelled spoiled. It had a best date of 9/4/20. This is the 1st time this has happened in 5 yrs of feeding them Primal. Amazon site says you cannot return this product. pretty expensive food and they don’t except responsibility. Hope the seller does. Opened another bag and it smelled bad. 2 out of 3 bags are bad. Seller needs to take care of this.
customer_reviews.author: Carley

customer_reviews.title: ... walks away from food and treats if he doesn't like the smell
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a very fussy eater and walks away from food and treats if he doesn't like the smell. When I started mixing in the water with the nuggets, he started to nudge my leg and you could see his nose sniffing. He had his face in the bowl before I put it on floor, inhaled it and wanted more. It is on the pricy side considering the amount you need to provide. I admit I began using less and adding dry food to bring it up his serving size. i would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Ate It Then Rejected It
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved this food for a couple of months then just stopped eating it. I hate wasting expensive food like this. Back to the drawing board.
customer_reviews.author: ArtsyLady

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful to use as a topper
customer_reviews.text: These are actually food but I have a picky dog so I crumble them and use them for a topper so my dog will eat. He loves the food the and dives right in and finished the whole bowl with no coaxing. Great quality and made in the US!
customer_reviews.author: penny bowers

customer_reviews.title: i have now created monsters for dogs, they will ...
customer_reviews.text: i have now created monsters for dogs, they will not touch their regular kibble without this as a topper. so worth it considering the ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Brianna F

customer_reviews.title: 5 Paws Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My 15 lb Maltipoo loves this food. He has severe food allergies and this has been amazing! I sprinkle 1/2 a cube over his dry kibble in the morning and evening (1/3 cup dry kibble) with a tsp of warm water for aroma :). This was the only way he would eat his limited ingredient dry food ha! Thank you for this amazing product Primal Pet. Though expensive, there is nothing I would not do for my Skittles! His health & well-being are important to me!
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Davis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product & My dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: My small dogs (20 pound range) are picky eaters but they love this chicken version of the Primal. I practically have to keep them off me when I am opening it they love it so much. As an added benefit, I noticed it has helped make their coats shinier & they have less problems with allergies than in the past. One bag lasts me about a week and a half. If you want to feed kibble or something else, too, you can always crumble this & use as a topper. One of my dogs is a senior dog & has had some teeth pulled, & she has no problems eating this food at all. High quality & recommended!
customer_reviews.author: C Ray

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. Be sure to provide water with this treat because they are powdery dry.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Dogs Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food. I have three pups and they refuse to eat their dry kibble unless they have some Primal with it. I use it as a stand alone food for them and sometimes mix in dry kibble to make it go a little further.
customer_reviews.author: WordFam

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I buy these raw nuggets regularly for my dog. However, the nuggets in this bag were usually hard and my dog did not like them as well. Usually they are much softer and easier for my little dog to eat. I had to order another bag and these are softer.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Only food my dog will eat
customer_reviews.text: Only food my dog will eat! It gave her so much energy. She plays like she did when she was a puppy again (she is 6 years old). She loves it so much that she taps on her bowl at dinner time to make us feed her. It is so annoying that we obey the dog!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Barber

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this product. We rehydrated one nugget and add it to her dry food, twice daily.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia A Morris

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Dog Food Promoting Long Life
customer_reviews.text: This is a superior freeze dried dog food and this company has been so easy to work with. My 16 1/2 year old dog is enjoying his long life partly because of this exceptional food.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Marsh/Dreaming Publications LLC

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are very picky about what they eat. So it was very surprising to find something they all love. I mix it with their regular dry food only because of the price. It is good for dogs with food allergies as I have not seen any signs of theirs when using this.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 5lb chihuahua has been eating this for the last 4 or 5 years. I've also fed her premium canned dog foods by Weruva and other brands but she got tired of those and stopped eating them. However, she loves this even after all of these years. I find that this product hydrates more easily with warm water.
customer_reviews.author: JDay

customer_reviews.title: My dog goes crazy for these. I break them ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog goes crazy for these. I break them up and sprinkle them on her food. What was a very fussy eater of a dog now licks her bowl clean every time.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Jones

customer_reviews.title: Raw is really the best
customer_reviews.text: This food has been great for my dog. Her coat, teeth, energy level--everything has improved since we went all raw. She's a nine-year-old dog, but she acts like she's four (which is kind of tiring, but, she's happy!).
customer_reviews.author: Mikenna

customer_reviews.title: Got wrong product
customer_reviews.text: Got beef formula instead of chicken and it is not possible to return
customer_reviews.author: Maria R.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: My dog love these as treats and also as toppers especially if they're picky!
customer_reviews.author: ChaquitasMom

customer_reviews.title: Great Reward for your Dog
customer_reviews.text: We were introduced to this product by our holistic vet, who keeps small bits in her office for after exam rewards. My dogs will do just about anything for these, unlike any other treat they receive. All they need to do is see the bag! Great product, great ingredients. Handy to keep in a pocket when you are outdoors. It can also be used for daily diet, so it is a wholesome product for those that have smaller breeds.
customer_reviews.author: Marmaduke

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Switch my dog to homemade and Raw food. Came across freeze dried and thought I’d try it. My dog like that and I always keep an extra bag around the house when I run out of fresh food.
customer_reviews.author: C. Allsup-Morris

customer_reviews.title: Dog really likes
customer_reviews.text: We sometimes have trouble getting our dog to eat - sprinkling a little of this on her food works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: C. B.

customer_reviews.title: Dry Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: This product is a little pricey. Chicken is my dogs favorite
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Colwell

customer_reviews.title: Great product. My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My dog loves it. Since I have put him on this, his skin condition is clearing up. Product was delivered faster than the projected delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: A dog favorite
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really enjoyed this variety. The bowls were licked clean
customer_reviews.author: Sevenmonkeys

customer_reviews.title: Doggies love it
customer_reviews.text: Doggies love it. I cut it in smaller pieces and serve dry and they still LOVE it
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Snider

customer_reviews.title: Healthy food choice.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth it. My dog eats it dry, she won't eat it if I add water. Vet said fine as long as she has fresh water available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs better packaging, it arrived as nearly dust.
customer_reviews.text: More than half the bag was disentegrated into powder, which would be fine if I wasn't using the pre shaped blocks as my guide line for measurement during feedings. My dog does like it, which is good as he's extremely finicky and won't eat nearly any canned food and very few dry.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Michels

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive but my dogs love it. I was looking for raw alternatives to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive but my dogs love it. I was looking for raw alternatives to Sojos, which has very little meat. One of my ogs is 13, the other 60 pounds so I can't afford only this. It seems like astronaut food. I hydrate it and mix it with the Sojos to stretch it, otherwise one ag doesn't even last a week. The only thing I don't like is that some of the bars are crumbled into powder in the bag, resulting in even less food.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: My dogs LOVE Primal Chicken and Primal Duck
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE Primal Chicken and Primal Duck. I alternate between the two and mix them into their kibble. They go nuts when I rattle the bag and I suddenly have 4 very patient and attentive little ones waiting in a line. 5-Stars for product quality, and 5-Stars for uber-fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Terri R.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is all my puppy will eat. He loves them, but they're expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Good, but very expensive
customer_reviews.text: My dog (toy breed) loves this food, but it is ridiculously expensive. Cannot imagine feeding this to a large dog or more than one dog. I wish I could find a quality raw food that was less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Ael

customer_reviews.title: Not the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this food for over a year because I believed raw was the way to go for the health of my dog. However the last bag I ordered was hard and rancid which leads me to believe it's not healthy at all. With an expiration date of October 2020 you have to wonder!
customer_reviews.author: C Ford

customer_reviews.title: Primal Freezed Dried dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs the Yorkie, Morkie, and German Shepherd love it.
customer_reviews.author: Afsan Marz

customer_reviews.title: Happy Dogs 3
customer_reviews.text: Dogs are Happy...Happy...Happy, and this was change for them from original bag of 'Duck' and then 'Pork'. I guess I will rotate for them.
customer_reviews.author: David P Clark

customer_reviews.title: I like the product. It works for what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. It works for what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs really like the chicken flavor and sometimes I mix it with ...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and was well packaged. My dogs really like the chicken flavor and sometimes I mix it with the beef that they REALLY love. The only problem is that the foul products don't seem to stay together as well. There always seems to be bits and pieces at the bottom. I will order chicken again but only to mix up their diet.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality food my dogs love. It is great for use on camping trips when it isn't possible to keep the refrigerated version cold enough.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Thank You PRIMAL!
customer_reviews.text: I would never have my dog go without it! She absolutely LOVES it! She's on the chicken and beef which I alternate for variety. Makes her coat shiny and she definitely licks her bowl clean at every feeding.
customer_reviews.author: maryann

customer_reviews.title: My dogs deserve the best
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it and I know it is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to kibble
customer_reviews.text: My pups love these. I add to their kibble as a treat, then add a small amount of water.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kicklighter

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy!
customer_reviews.text: My dog wouldn't touch it. He's 14 and has health issues so I thought this might be healthier for him. It looked disgusting after being hydrated and it must've been bad because he wouldn't even try it and I tried more than once. And, it's not eligible for return, so $30 wasted!!
customer_reviews.author: Betty S.

customer_reviews.title: My cat really loves this. I live in a ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat really loves this. I live in a different country and bring back a few bags when I visit the US. These freeze-dried bags are lightweight and convenient for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  My dog actually eats this!!
customer_reviews.text: Yay! I have tried soooo many foods.... So happy ...I finally found something my little spoiled rotten chi will eat.....he actually likes it! I tried the beef and he sorta ate it, but this one is great. It's softer and crumbles easily, and he loves chicken. (Usually the kind I cook) for him. It is expensive, but after throwing out so many other kinds, it's worth it to find something he likes. And it's easy to prepare.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schneider

product_meta.title: Primal Freeze Dried Dog Food Chicken Formula
product_meta.description: Size:14 ozPrimal Formulas are produced using only the freshest, 100% human-grade ingredients. Our poultry, meat and game are antibiotic and steroid free without added hormones. We incorporate certified organic produce, certified organic minerals and unrefined vitamins to fortify our complete and balanced diets. All Primal Formulas contain fresh ground bone for calcium supplementation. This combination of ingredients offers optimum levels of the amino acids (protein), essential fatty acids, natural-occurring enzymes, and necessary vitamins and minerals that are the building blocks for your pet's healthy biological functions. All of the ingredients found in Primal Formulas are procured from ranches and farms throughout the United States and New Zealand that take pride in producing wholesome raw foods through natural, sustainable agriculture. Primal Formulas offer you the convenience and benefits of a well-balanced, safe and wholesome raw-food diet without having to grind, chop, measure or mix the ingredients yourself. At Primal Pet Foods, we have taken the time to carefully formulate and produce a nutritious, fresh-food diet that is easy for you to serve and delectable for pets to devour. The proof is watching them lick the bowl clean while thriving happily and healthfully.
feature_bullets: Complete And Balanced Diet For All Life Stages
